sentences.sContent: Marketing techniques are becoming increasingly sophisticated.
sentences.sCn: 市场营销技巧越来越巧妙。

sentences.sContent: Increasingly, young people distrust all forms of government.
sentences.sCn: 年轻人越来越不相信任何形式的政府。

sentences.sContent: ...organisations increasingly use “team” as a verb rather than a noun: they form teams for specific purposes and then quickly disband them...
...teamwork is becoming increasingly popular among companies...
...scientists are increasingly learning that aging and biological age are two different things...
...Other skin cancers are increasingly likely with long-term exposure...
...well-educated people increasingly work longer than the less-skilled...
...O'Sullivan suggests that romantic love has increasingly come to be seen as the factor that should determine who we stay with and for how long...
...researchers are increasingly questioning whether all of this testing is necessary for the elderly...
...I see people pursuing higher paying and increasingly demanding careers to accomplish this goal...

exam.question: The international situation has been growing ________ difficult for the last few years.

answer.explain: 句意：  过去几年中， 国际形势变得愈发严峻了。invariably：  不变地， 总是； presumably：  推测起来， 大概； dominantly：  支配性地。

trans.tranOther: more and more all the time
